analysis.description:
Mentoring._flushBalance (/unique_chucks/8/0x6c602f1798a453f90f249e208e2b64c7c09226f7.sol#328-344) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- address(heroes).transfer(balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0x6c602f1798a453f90f249e208e2b64c7c09226f7.sol#336)

	Dangerous calls:
	- _account.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x6c602f1798a453f90f249e208e2b64c7c09226f7.sol#352)

CanReclaimToken.reclaimToken (/unique_chucks/8/0x6c602f1798a453f90f249e208e2b64c7c09226f7.sol#235-245) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner(),balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0x6c602f1798a453f90f249e208e2b64c7c09226f7.sol#245)
